description: Aristotle’s On Memory and Recollection:Concepts, Sources, and Innovations of Aristotle’s Account of Mnemonic Capacities and Activities. Masters thesis, Durham University. MIHOC, JUSTIN,ALEXANDRU (2010) The Ascension of Jesus Christ: A Critical and Exegetical Study of the Ascension in Luke-Acts and in the Jewish and Christian Contexts.
title: Aristotle’s On Memory and Recollection:Concepts, Sources, and Innovations of Aristotle’s Account of Mnemonic Capacities and Activities
